text: Hey, are you alright?
speaker: protag_neutral

text: You're safe now. It looks like she's left us alone.
speaker: protag_neutral

text: Oof... I'm-- I'm okay.
speaker: zatt_sad

text: How did someone your age get all the way up here? We should be getting you home.
speaker: protag_neutral

text: I can never go home now...
speaker: zatt_despair

text: ...not that I'd really want to, even if I could.
speaker: zatt_sad

text: I failed as a warrior. I couldn't drive away the Shadow Queen, unlike you. Your mystic artes are so powerful.
speaker: zatt_sad

text: Warrior? Mystic Artes? What are you talking about?
speaker: protag_neutral

text: Aren't you a warrior? Don't you protect us from demons that wander the earth?
speaker: zatt_neutral

text: Uh, no?
speaker: protag_annoyed

text: We're not on the Earth. We're on the Moon!
speaker: protag_neutral

text: Didn't you see me fire the Satellite Laser just now?
speaker: protag_neutral

text: I protect the moon's real-estate from the creatures that come out here.
speaker: protag_neutral

text: What?!?
speaker: zatt_yelling

text: Isn't that the Moon, up in the sky?
speaker: zatt_neutral

text: That's definitely the Earth.
speaker: protag_annoyed

text: Can you see all the lights from the cities?
speaker: protag_neutral

text: This is all so confusing...
speaker: zatt_neutral

text: (later, at the bottom of the tower)
Okay, hold on.
speaker: protag_neutral

text: Let me get this straight.
speaker: protag_neutral

text: You've spent your life living in a remote town off the grid...
speaker: protag_neutral

text: ...training to be some kind of magic knight that fights Lunarbeasts?
speaker: protag_neutral

text: No, not a knight. A Wizard of the Board.
speaker: zatt_neutral

text: Knights move in L-shapes.
speaker: zatt_neutral

text: Um, right.
speaker: protag_annoyed

text: I'll be honest with you Zatt. This all sounds pretty messed up.
speaker: protag_neutral

text: Why do they need warriors when there's the satellite array?
speaker: protag_neutral

text: We don't live in some ancient fantasy land.
speaker: protag_neutral

text: You're not even allowed to go home because of this!
speaker: protag_neutral

text: Ah, I'm sorry.
speaker: protag_neutral

text: This is probably all you've ever known.
speaker: protag_neutral

text: Hmm...
speaker: protag_annoyed

text: Hey, why don't you come stay with me for a little bit?
speaker: protag_happy

text: Really? You'd let me come stay with you?
speaker: zatt_neutral

text: I can use a washboard really well. I'd make it worth your while!
speaker: zatt_neutral

text: Hm... I think we've got a washing machine for that back at the residence.
speaker: protag_neutral

text: What's a washing machine?
speaker: zatt_neutral

text: Don't worry about it for now.
speaker: protag_neutral

text: You know, given your skills, you could certainly get a part-time job at the Lunar Fufillment Site.
speaker: protag_happy

text: I think you're going to be okay, Zatt.
speaker: protag_happy
